Controllers:

  • EnvironmentController:

    src.controllers.environment_controller.EnvironmentController.reset(self, type_no: Dict[AgentType, Tuple[int, Tuple[float, float]]] | None = None, x_dim=None, y_dim=None)

    Resets the environment by deleting all the current agents and inserting new ones

    Parameters:

    • type_no (Dict[AgentType, (int, (float, float))] or None) – Dict[AgentType, (agent_id, (x, y))]. For each agent type a number of respected agents are passed as input

    • x_dim (int or None) – environment’s x-axis dimension

    • y_dim (int or None) – environment’s y-axis dimension

    Returns:

    The environment

    Return type:

    Environment
